text: The fact that economic activity of a limited cooperative association, a subsidiary, or a related entity, is organized under this chapter shall not in itself cause the activity to be considered a conspiracy, a combination in restraint of trade, an illegal monopoly, or an attempt to lessen competition or fix prices arbitrarily.
historical:

1981 Ed., § 29-1142.

1973 Ed., § 29-842.

Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

Editor's Notes

Former § 29-937 has been recodified as § 29A-937.

DC CODE § 29-937

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Compliance with chapter; not in restraint of trade.
